description: Shopee Open Platform documentation for developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs

main_sections.name: What is Shopee Open Platform?
main_sections.description: Created to support developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs, Shopee Open Platform is your go-to source of Open APIs and services

main_sections.name: Benefits of using Shopee Open API?
main_sections.description: Shopee Open API provides sellers with quick and easy access to important shop data for selling on Shopee. This includes information for product, order, and campaign management, amongst others.

main_sections.name: Who can access Shopee Open Platform?
main_sections.description: Shopee Open Platform caters to 2 types of developers: software service providers and sellers with software development capabilities

key_features: Powerful APIs for orders, products, marketing

notes: This appears to be the introduction/overview page of the Shopee Open Platform documentation. It contains no specific API endpoint information but rather general platform information and navigation structure. The left sidebar shows various documentation sections including Getting Started, API calls, Push Mechanism notifications, Authorization and Authentication, among others.
